body.name: Pipishell Full Motion TV Wall Mount for 37-75 inch Flat/Curved TVs up to 100lbs, Wall Mount TV Bracket Swivel and Tilt, TV Mount Fits 8/12/16" Wood Studs, Max VESA 600x400mm, PILF3
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 16 hrs 48 mins
features: WIDE COMPATIBILITY: This Pipishell TV wall mount fits most 37 to 75 inch flat or curved TVs up to 100 lbs with VESA patterns 200x100 to 600x400mm. The wall mount tv bracket can be installed on 8”,12",16” wood studs, concrete, and brick walls. Please do not mount on drywall alone.

MOUNT YOUR TV SECURELY: This ultra-strong, solid steel frame and reinforced tv wall mount would make sure your TV will stay securely in place, the security locks and anti-drop end caps would provide your TV dependable security.

ENJOY MULTI-ANGLE VIEWING: Easily adjust the Pipishell TV wall mount bracket with +/-45° swivel to enjoy a better viewing angle in your living room, kitchen, or bedroom; +5°/-15° tilt helps to reduce glare, while +/-3° leveling allows you to fine tune your TV position after installation.

BRING YOUR TV CLOSER: The full motion TV mount features smoothly 16.73" extension to bring your screen closer and provides a wider range of motion. Retract the wall mount back to 2.99" from the wall to save space for a streamlined look.

FAST & EASY INSTALLATION: The swivel TV wall mount comes with instruction manual, drilling template, and standard mounting hardware for hassle-free installation. Please reach out to our U.S.-based customer service team if you have any pre-purchase or installation issues.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Pipishell Large Full Motion TV Wall Mount | Ultimate Flexibility for Larger TVs Mount your TV on wall that frees up space for a more professional, streamlined look. The articulating TV Mount allows the TV to be folded flat against the wall when pushed back and extended outwards while maintaining its centralized position, it also can be tilted and swivel to different directions.

The thick wall plate design with enhanced edges provides improved strength, while security locks and extra foam padding ensure TV stability to absorb shock and vibration. The full motion tv wall mount was designed with strength and versatility in mind, engineered from high-quality steel.

Pipishell TV wall mount is simple to adjust after installation, you can level ±3°, extend the arms with ease to position your TV 2.99” to 16.73” away from the wall. Swivel the screen +/-45° and tilt up or down +/-15° for optimum viewing.
Do not forget to check your TV before purchasing a tv mount.

TV campatible Fits 37" to 75" flat or curved TVs, supports TV weight up to 100lbs / 45kg, Compatible with SAMSUNG/LG/SONY/Hisense/VIZIO/TCL/SHARP/Toshiba/Panasonic/philips/SKYWORTH and more VESA mounting hole patterns 200x100/200x200/300X200/300x300/400x200 400x300/400X400/500x300/600x200/600x400mm (8"x4"/8"x8"/12"x8"/12"x12"/16"x8"/16"x12"/16"x16"/20"x12"/24"x8"/24"x16") Tilt range 5degrees forward and 15 degrees backward Swivel range 45 degrees left or right for different viewing requirements and rotates 3 degrees for perfect TV level adjustment Distance to wall Extends out 16.73 inch max and folds back to 2.99 inch back from the wall to save space, Wall type 8/12/16 inch wood stud wall, concrete wall, brick walls, DO NOT INSTALL ON DRYWALL ALONE. Package includes: 1x TV wall mount / 1x Standard mounting hardware bag / 1x User manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy Installation and Durable
reviews.reviewText: The mount is incredibly sturdy, giving me confidence that our large TV is secure and safe. The installation process was surprisingly easy, with clear instructions that made the setup a breeze. What I appreciate most is the great range of motion it offers, allowing us to easily adjust the viewing angle for optimal comfort. Highly recommend to anyone looking for a robust and versatile TV wall mount!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to mount a TV using this mount. Very sturdy on the wall and easy to move the tv

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Strong mount easy install good range of motion installed on a 55 inch tv . Would recommend this mount

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The thing I liked most about this is that it comes with every type of hardware you could possible need to install it anywhere on any material. It is a little funky to move around but it does feel sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bang for your buck
reviews.reviewText: How could you not be happy getting your TV off the stand and freeing up the room under it for such a steal of a price! Comes with everything you need in the box to get it mounted besides the drill and the TV. This is a huge upgrade over the flat mounting brackets which I would never buy again. Can't beat the full motion versatility of it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to mount on the wall and very sturdy
reviews.reviewText: This is a small unit that is mounted vertically on one stud in the wall. As soon as we measured for the right height, pre-drilled the pilot holes it was installed in a couple of minutes. For my tv I did not have to use the extensions for the plate that connects my tv with the wall mount. My tv sits pretty flat against the wall but I can pull it out and angle it to the side and I can watch while I cook or clean up. I like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than the expensive ones
reviews.reviewText: This TV Wall Mount is much better than my neighbors much more expensive mounts. I went over to several of my neighbors to inspect their 65" and 75" TV mounts. If you try and move their TV's the mounts are too tight and feel like the mount or the TV's are going to fail. This Pipishell Full Motion comes with everything you need for install and once installed the tension is perfect to move or keep it in place. This thing feels strong enough to handle the task with ease. My 95 lb. grandson did several chin ups with the unit extended out with no problems. I am very pleased with the Pipishell.
